name: test-project

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle

sql_queries.get_users: SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE active = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
sql_queries.complex_query:
SELECT u.id, u.name, p.title, COUNT(c.id) as comment_count
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN posts p ON u.id = p.user_id
LEFT JOIN comments c ON p.id = c.post_id
WHERE u.active = 1
GROUP BY u.id, p.id
HAVING comment_count > 0
ORDER BY comment_count DESC
